comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Firefox takes too long loading pics from anywhere on last.fm.
Safari et al. doesn't. Firefox started doing so just this past Friday.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. go to last.fm
2. search image gallery of any artist
3. click on a pic to go to next page
Actual Results:  
page took 2 mins to load picture

Expected Results:  
should have loaded pic in 5 sec

comments.text:
>2. search image gallery of any artist
What are the steps to do that ?
Never use "any" for an example, always include a Name that you used for your test.
